mapper.select: SELECT tc.cart_idx as cart_idx, tc.or_member_id as or_member_id, tc.goods_cnt as goods_cnt, tc.order_date as order_date, tp.product_name as product_name, tp.publisher as publisher, tp.author as author, tp.price as price, tp.discount as discount FROM tbl_cart AS tc INNER JOIN tbl_product AS tp ON tc.product_no = tp.product_idx WHERE tc.or_member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart(or_member_id, product_no, product_cnt) VALUES (#{or_member_id}, #{product_no}, product_cnt)
